      com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<QueryTarget> eval(QueryExpression exp, QueryEnvironment env)

    • Method Detail

      • eval

        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<QueryTarget> eval(QueryExpression exp,
                                                         QueryEnvironment env)
                                                  throws QueryException
        Evaluates the result of a query expression in the given environment.
        Parameters:
        exp - the query expression to be evaluated.
        env - the environment used for evaluation of the given query.
        Returns:
        the evaluated target set.
        Throws:
        QueryException - if evaluation fails.
